name: CR Stock Entry
query:
SELECT
`tabStock Entry`.name as "Stock Entry:Link/Stock Entry:100",
`tabStock Entry`.posting_date as "P Date:Date/Date:80",
`tabItem`.process_no as "PNo:Data:50",
`tabStock Entry`.bom_no as "BOM No:Link/BOM:160",

`tabBOM`.item_name as "Item Name:Link/Item:200",

`tabBOM`.raw_material_cost as "RM cost:Float/Currency:80",

`tabBOM`.operating_cost as "Operat Cost:Float/Currency:80",
`tabBOM`.total_cost as "Total Cost:Float/Currency:80",
`tabStock Entry Detail`.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float/Currency:70",
`tabStock Entry Detail`.valuation_rate as "Valuation Rate:Float/Currency:70",
`tabStock Entry Detail`.qty as "Qty:Float:80",
`tabStock Entry Detail`.basic_amount as "Basic Amount:Float/Currency:120",
`tabStock Entry`.total_incoming_value "Total Value:Float/Currency:120",
`tabBOM Item`.item_name as "Input Item:Link/Item:180",
`tabStock Entry`.purchase_order as "Purchase Order:Link/Purchase Order:160",
`tabStock Entry`.supplier as "Supplier:Data:160",
`tabStock Entry`.project as "Project:Data:180",
`tabStock Entry`.production_type as "Production Type:Data:110",
`tabStock Entry`.owner as "Created By:Data:140"


FROM
`tabStock Entry`,
`tabStock Entry Detail`,
`tabItem`,
`tabBOM`,
`tabBOM Item`

WHERE
`tabStock Entry`.name=`tabStock Entry Detail`.parent &&
`tabStock Entry Detail`.bom_no=`tabBOM`.name &&
`tabBOM Item`.parent=`tabBOM`.name &&
`tabBOM`.item_name=`tabItem`.item_name &&
`tabStock Entry`.cycle=%(cycle)s &&
`tabStock Entry`.production_type=%(production_type)s

ORDER BY `tabItem`.process_no DESC
